chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:

Hello Backmarket Team,

I have a problem with my iPhone. I bought it in excellent condition, as described on your homepage, where external damage is only noticeable at a maximum distance of 20cm without magnification.
The iPhone arrived at my place on Thursday. The excitement was, of course, great. Yesterday, something fell off my phone. I was very surprised. Both lenses of the rear camera were equipped with small protective caps. Underneath, there were clear signs of wear and tear. I wouldn't describe it as excellent condition. These scratches can be seen even when viewed from at least one meter away.
I'm very disappointed that I paid a lot of money for a device and then as the seller tried to hide this damage.

I would like you to take steps to compensate me accordingly and refund part of the costs.
The scratches can be seen in the attachment.

Best regards,
Femke Lorenzen

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 60€ to the customer for grad discrepancy.

Kind regards, 
Claudia from Back Market
